statements: SELECT * FROM GeneProteinInteraction;
SELECT gene_id, protein_id FROM GeneProteinInteraction;
SELECT interaction_type FROM GeneProteinInteraction;
SELECT * FROM GeneProteinInteraction WHERE gene_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM GeneProteinInteraction WHERE interaction_type = 'Direct';
SELECT * FROM GeneProteinInteraction WHERE gene_id = 1 ORDER BY protein_id DESC;
SELECT gene_id, protein_id, interaction_type FROM GeneProteinInteraction WHERE interaction_type = 'activation' ORDER BY gene_id ASC;
SELECT gene_id, COUNT(protein_id) as protein_count FROM GeneProteinInteraction GROUP BY gene_id HAVING COUNT(protein_id) > 5;
SELECT gene_id, MAX(protein_id) as max_protein_id FROM GeneProteinInteraction GROUP BY gene_id;
SELECT interaction_type, COUNT(*) as interaction_count FROM GeneProteinInteraction GROUP BY interaction_type ORDER BY interaction_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM genes;
SELECT gene_name, gene_sequence FROM genes WHERE gene_id = 1;
SELECT gene_id, gene_name, gene_sequence FROM genes ORDER BY gene_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM proteins;
SELECT protein_name, gene_id FROM proteins WHERE protein_type = 'Enzyme';
SELECT gene_id, gene_name FROM genes WHERE gene_id = 101;
SELECT protein_id, protein_name, protein_type FROM proteins WHERE protein_type = 'enzyme';
SELECT gene_id, gene_sequence FROM genes WHERE gene_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT gene_id, gene_name, gene_sequence FROM genes WHERE gene_sequence IS NOT NULL;
SELECT gene_id, gene_name, protein_name FROM genes JOIN proteins ON genes.gene_id = proteins.gene_id;
SELECT * FROM genes;
SELECT gene_name, gene_type FROM genes WHERE gene_type = 'RNA';
SELECT gene_id, gene_name, gene_sequence FROM genes WHERE gene_sequence LIKE '%ATCG%';
SELECT * FROM proteins ORDER BY protein_name DESC;
SELECT protein_id, protein_name, protein_type FROM proteins WHERE protein_type = 'Enzyme';
SELECT gene_id, gene_name, gene_type FROM genes ORDER BY gene_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM proteins WHERE protein_type = 'enzymatic';
SELECT gene_name, gene_type, gene_sequence FROM genes WHERE gene_type = 'regulatory' AND gene_sequence IS NOT NULL;
SELECT gi.*, g.gene_name, p.protein_name FROM gene_protein_interactions gi JOIN genes g ON gi.gene_id = g.gene_id JOIN proteins p ON gi.protein_id = p.protein_id;
SELECT count(*) AS num_interactions, interaction_type FROM gene_protein_interactions GROUP BY interaction_type ORDER BY num_interactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM genes;
SELECT gene_name, gene_sequence FROM genes WHERE gene_id = 1;
SELECT protein_name FROM proteins WHERE protein_id = 2;
SELECT gene_name, protein_name, interaction_type FROM genes JOIN gene_protein_interaction ON genes.gene_id = gene_protein_interaction.gene_id;
SELECT * FROM experiments ORDER BY experiment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM genes;
SELECT gene_id, gene_name FROM genes WHERE gene_id > 100;
SELECT protein_id, protein_name, protein_sequence FROM proteins WHERE protein_name LIKE '%protein%';
SELECT * FROM gene_protein_interaction ORDER BY interaction_id DESC;
SELECT experiment_id, experiment_name, experiment_date FROM experiments WHERE experiment_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY experiment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Genes;
SELECT gene_id, gene_name FROM Genes WHERE gene_id = 1;
SELECT gene_name, gene_description FROM Genes WHERE gene_id > 2;
SELECT * FROM Proteins WHERE protein_type = 'Enzyme' ORDER BY protein_id DESC;
SELECT protein_name, protein_sequence FROM Proteins WHERE protein_id BETWEEN 3 AND 5;
SELECT gene_name, gene_description FROM Genes WHERE gene_id = 1;
SELECT gene_name, gene_description FROM Genes WHERE gene_name LIKE '%cell%';
SELECT * FROM Proteins WHERE protein_type = 'Enzyme' ORDER BY protein_name DESC;
SELECT gene_name, function_name FROM Genes JOIN GeneFunctions ON Genes.gene_id = GeneFunctions.gene_id;

SELECT gene_name, protein_name, interaction_type FROM Genes JOIN GeneProteinInteractions ON Genes.gene_id = GeneProteinInteractions.gene_id JOIN Proteins ON GeneProteinInteractions.protein_id = Proteins.protein_id WHERE interaction_type = 'Binding';
